0.title: Summer Average Temperature
0.subTitle: [stationName]
0.caption: Average annual summer (June to August) temperature. The lowest (min) and highest (max) temperature of the month.

1.title: Summer Average Temperature Difference from Baseline
1.subTitle: [stationName]
1.caption: Difference between the summer (June-August) seasonal averages and the average for the baseline period, typically 1961 to 1990.
